job_tasks.phrase: implementing cutting-edge machine learning algorithms and models to solve complex problems
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation and implementation of machine learning models.
Mentions specific types of models (Generative AI) that are part of the modeling process.

job_tasks.phrase: Build a scalable Syntho Engine Core Application
job_tasks.justification: Describes the creation of an application, which falls under software development.
Indicates integration and building of application components, a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Responsible for developing and implementing cutting-edge machine learning algorithms and models
job_tasks.justification: While mentioning models, the phrase 'developing and implementing' also points to the software engineering aspect of bringing these models to life in an application.

job_tasks.phrase: A key role in developing our software solution
job_tasks.justification: Directly states involvement in developing a software solution.

job_tasks.phrase: Improve, extend and benchmark key functionalities of our software solution
job_tasks.justification: These actions (improving, extending, benchmarking) are all related to the ongoing development and refinement of a software solution.

job_tasks.phrase: Identify and implement new features for improving our software solution
job_tasks.justification: Implementing new features is a core software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Actively participate in technical strategy sessions with respect to the development of our solution
job_tasks.justification: Participating in strategy sessions indicates involvement in higher-level planning and alignment with business goals.

soft_skills.phrase: Work with state-of-the-art technologies and become front-runner with the latest (AI) developments
An awesome startup culture of responsibility and freedom to turn your ambition into reality
Actively participate in technical strategy sessions

classification.rationale: The job description explicitly mentions 'Generative AI models' and the development of an application built around them. It also highlights the use of specific GenAI-related technologies like Ray and FastAPI, indicating a focus on building production-grade user-facing systems powered by generative AI.
